name: Escape Artist (itch)
description:
I wanted to make a fun little platformer but then it got a little out of control and I made a really difficult game. All the levels are possible (passed them myself), and screenshots for bragging rights is appreciated.

This game was created in GameMaker Studio 2 over the course of 1 week.

Programming and Art are by Xenvex(Me)

Music by One Man Symphony: https://onemansymphony.bandcamp.com/releases

Menu Theme: "Loading Menu/Screen Theme Version 2": https://onemansymphony.bandcamp.com/track/loading-menu-screen-theme-version-ii

In-Game Theme: "Moving in Frozen Time Pt.5": https://onemansymphony.bandcamp.com/track/moving-in-the-frozen-time-pt-5

People that have fully completed the game:

-KiddLazy(1832 Deaths)
